entry.title: What a day! AoE2 Rome DLC, Age of Mythology, and more!

media:group.media:title: What a day! AoE2 Rome DLC, Age of Mythology, and more!
media:group.media:description:
Big news for AoE2, AoE4, Age of Mythology, AoE3, and (sort of) AoE1. The 25th anniversary of Age of Empires had a lot of exciting news, regardless of which entry of the franchise you follow. ___________________________________________________________

entry.title: The AI's best and worst civilizations (updated)

media:group.media:title: The AI's best and worst civilizations (updated)
media:group.media:description:
Which civilizations is the AI worst at playing, and which is it best at? After 2583 1v1 games playing against itself, we may have a good idea. Updated to include the new civilizations on the most recent patch and all the changes to the AI (militia, man-at-arms, and scout rush).
0:35 How do we find out how well it plays civs? 2:40 The AI's worst civilization 3:20 Other poor performing civs 5:50 Byzantines 6:35 Huns 7:27 Bohemians 8:15 Burgundians 8:55 Slavs 9:42 Teutons 10:33 The #1 AI civ (not Franks!)
Source for stats: https://app.powerbi.com/view?r=eyJrIjoiNGU3NjljMjMtOTg4ZC00MDZjLWE1YTAtM2RjZjdkZTJlM2EzIiwidCI6ImY5NThhNTY0LWM0MDMtNGFjOS05MmYxLTM4OWM3OGI5NWM1YiIsImMiOjl9
___________________________________________________________
Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/SpiritoftheLaw
Background music from Epidemic Sound: http://www.epidemicsound.com
Game: Age of Empires II Definitive Edition

media:group.media:title: The Condottiero! (AoE2)
media:group.media:description:
Breakdown and discussion of the Italian's team unit - the Condottiero! More specifically, we'll see how it compares to the champion in a few different situations, as well as discuss which civilizations benefit the most from an Italian ally.
0:55 Condottiero stats vs Champion 2:05 Hidden attack bonuses 2:38 Gunpowder resistance 3:22 Upgrades 4:40 vs Champion 5:20 vs Trash units 6:03 vs Eagles 6:40 vs Hand Cannons 7:25 vs Janissaries 8:02 vs Arbalesters 8:30 The best condottieros 9:35 Civs with bad champions

entry.title: Defensive Stance, Guard, and Follow: What's the difference?

media:group.media:title: Defensive Stance, Guard, and Follow: What's the difference?
media:group.media:description:
Break down of exactly how defensive stance, guard, and follow work. Guard, especially, has me thinking I should probably use it more often, but not for the reason I expected.
0:52 Unit behaviour on defensive stance 2:20 Changing the units' LOS 2:55 Retreating from archers 3:35 Defensive stance practical examples 4:00 Siege and demo ships 5:20 Guard 8:01 Guard "increases attack speed" 9:30 Self-guarding scouts 11:15 Follow ___________________________________________________________

Background music from Epidemic Sound: http://www.epidemicsound.com
Game: Age of Empires II Definitive Edition

entry.title: Should AoE2 copy AoE4's new naval changes?

media:group.media:title: Should AoE2 copy AoE4's new naval changes?
media:group.media:description:
AoE4 is getting an overhaul on water maps, and in this video we'll look at what those changes are, and whether AoE2 might benefit from a similar approach.
0:40 Popularity of water maps in AoE2 1:55 The even lower popularity of water in AoE4 3:50 Naval system in AoE2 4:42 New naval system in AoE4 7:10 Should AoE2 follow AoE4? ___________________________________________________________
Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/SpiritoftheLaw
Background music from Epidemic Sound: http://www.epidemicsound.com
Game: Age of Empires II Definitive Edition

media:group.media:title: Vikings - Through the Ages (1999 vs 2022)
media:group.media:description:
Part six of a mini-series looking back at the changes made to the original civilizations in Age of Kings. The focus this time is on Vikings.

entry.title: AoE4's (Free) New Civs! What we know so far...

media:group.media:title: AoE4's (Free) New Civs! What we know so far...
media:group.media:description:
Two new civilizations have been announced: Malians and Ottomans. Even more surprising, they're free for all Age of Empires 4 players.
Source: https://www.ageofempires.com/news/age-iv-anniversary-update-oct-25/
How to play for free: Download Age of Empires IV from Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1466860/Age_of_Empires_IV/ or buy from Steam or Microsoft Store https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/age-of-empires-iv/9n94ncgm1q2n
___________________________________________________________
Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/SpiritoftheLaw
Background music from Epidemic Sound: http://www.epidemicsound.com
Game: Age of Empires IV
